CustomField.inlineHelpText: On behalf of our partners at TD Merchant Services, may a TD Bank representative contact you to discuss the option of accepting debit and or credit payments ( e.g Visa, Mastercard, Interac, Direct Payment) ?
CustomField.label: TDR Authorize (TDR)

value.fullName: Yes. I authorize TD bank to contact me.
value.label: Yes. I authorize TD bank to contact me.

value.fullName: No. I do not authorize TD bank to contact me.
value.label: No. I do not authorize TD bank to contact me.
